title: Introducing: Little Kid
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/littlekid.jpg "littlekid")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8492-introducing-little-kid/attachment/littlekid) ‘Lo-Fi’ music has became a bit of a dirty word. The attitude of ‘sticking a bit of reverb on it and hoping for the best’ has taken over, leaving a lot of contemporary music coming across as fashion music and little else. [**Little Kid**](http://www.facebook.com/#!/pages/Little-Kid/) does not fall into that trap. Sure his music could be described as Lo-Fi, it is made on a 4-track after all, but beneath the crackles and hisses are beautifully constructed folk numbers, with the background noises only adding to the lonely and introspective atmosphere. He has a 10 song album up for free download, be a star and download it now. Logic Songs by Little Kid
